parts.text: {"word":"terminar","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"終える、完了する、終わらせる","english_definition":"to finish, complete, or end something","examples":[{"sentence":"Necesito terminar este trabajo hoy.","translation":"今日この仕事を終える必要があります。","example_translation":"I need to finish this work today."},{"sentence":"¿Ya terminaste de leer el libro?","translation":"もうその本を読み終えましたか？","example_translation":"Have you finished reading the book?"},{"sentence":"Vamos a terminar la reunión ahora.","translation":"今から会議を終わらせます。","example_translation":"We are going to end the meeting now."}],"collocations":["terminar un trabajo (仕事を終える)","terminar un libro (本を読み終える)","terminar una relación (関係を終わらせる)","terminar un proyecto (プロジェクトを完了する)"],"synonyms":["acabar","finalizar","concluir","completar"],"antonyms":["empezar","iniciar","comenzar","abrir"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"終わる、完了する","english_definition":"to end, finish, or be completed","examples":[{"sentence":"La película termina a las diez.","translation":"映画は10時に終わります。","example_translation":"The movie ends at ten."},{"sentence":"La fiesta terminó muy tarde.","translation":"パーティーはとても遅く終わりました。","example_translation":"The party ended very late."},{"sentence":"El verano termina en septiembre.","translation":"夏は9月に終わります。","example_translation":"Summer ends in September."}],"collocations":["terminar pronto (早く終わる)","terminar tarde (遅く終わる)","terminar bien (うまく終わる)","terminar mal (悪い結果になる)"],"synonyms":["acabarse","finalizar","concluir","cesar"],"antonyms":["empezar","iniciarse","comenzar","continuar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vi","definition":"(terminar + gerundio) ～して終わる、結局～になる","english_definition":"(terminar + gerund) to end up doing something, to wind up","examples":[{"sentence":"Terminé gastando todo mi dinero.","translation":"結局、お金を全部使ってしまった。","example_translation":"I ended up spending all my money."},{"sentence":"Terminamos comiendo pizza.","translation":"結局ピザを食べることになった。","example_translation":"We ended up eating pizza."},{"sentence":"Siempre terminamos discutiendo.","translation":"いつも結局は議論になる。","example_translation":"We always end up arguing."}],"collocations":["terminar haciendo algo (結局何かをする)","terminar siendo algo (結局何かのようになる)"],"synonyms":["acabar","resultar"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「terminare」に由来し、「境界を定める、終える」という意味を持つ。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/teɾ.miˈnaɾ/","syllables":"ter-mi-nar"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["termino","terminas","termina","terminamos","termináis","terminan"],"past_simple":"terminé","terminaste","terminó","terminamos","terminasteis","terminaron","future_simple":"terminaré","terminarás","terminará","terminaremos","terminaréis","terminarán","present_subjunctive":"termine","termines","termine","terminemos","terminéis","terminen","past_subjunctive":"terminara","terminaras","terminara","termináramos","terminarais","terminaran","imperative":"termina","terminad"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「terminar」は、何かを終える、完了するという意味の基本的な動詞です。他動詞としても自動詞としても使用でき、文脈によって意味が異なります。他動詞の場合は、何かを終わらせる対象が必要で、自動詞の場合は、何かが自然に終わることを意味します。また、「terminar + gerundio」の形で、最終的な結果や行動を表すのにも使用されます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo termino a la casa.","correct":"Yo termino en la casa.","note":"「terminar en」は場所を表す場合に使う。"},{"incorrect":"Terminé de comer a las ocho.","correct":"Terminé de comer a las ocho.","note":"「terminar de + infinitivo」は正しい使い方。"},{"incorrect":"Necesito terminar mi tarea para mañana.","correct":"Necesito terminar mi tarea para mañana.","note":"「terminar + 名詞」は正しい使い方。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["terminación (名詞: 終了、結末)","terminado (形容詞: 完了した、完成した)","terminal (形容詞: 終末の、末期の；名詞: ターミナル)"],"phrases":["dar por terminado (終了とみなす)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"A2","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"A2","text":"「terminar」は「おわる」という意味の基本的な動詞です。何かを「おわらせる」ときや、何かが「おわる」ときに使います。例えば、「しゅくだいをおわらせる」や「がっこうがおわる」のように使います。また、「けっきょく～することになる」という意味でも使えます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"¿Cuándo vas a **terminar** el proyecto?","translation":"いつプロジェクトを終える予定ですか？","type":"verb (vt)","meaning_category":"終える、完了する"},{"sentence":"La clase **termina** a las tres.","translation":"授業は3時に終わります。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"終わる、完了する"},{"sentence":"Siempre **terminamos** pidiendo pizza.","translation":"いつも結局ピザを注文することになります。","type":"verb (vi)","meaning_category":"～して終わる"}]}
